<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/governance/license-analytics/dashboard"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns summary statistics, per-pool metrics, cost breakdowns by vendor,
and recent audit events for the tenant's license portfolio.

  parameters={undefined}
